comment: Justice Nichols should be investigated for corruption and collusion as well
commentable_entity.ask: Amber heard should face perjury charges in the uk
commentable_entity.title: Amber heard should face perjury charges in the uk
commentable_entity.description:
In July 2020 during Mr depp's legal libal case against Dan Wooton and the sun newspaper amber heard knowingly gave false information while under oath. Amber stated that she HAD already donated the 7 million divorce settlement between the ACLU and the Los Angeles children's hospital at 3.5 million dollars each. 

During the recent depp v heard defamation case it has now become evident that this was not true. A representative from the ACLU testified that they have only received 1.3 million to date and most of that wasn't from amber herself, amber heard herself finally testified that she in fact HAD not donated the 7 million or even anywhere close to it. 

Given the fact that judge nichols also referenced the 7 million donation in his written verdict i/we the public feel that amber should be investigated for willingly committing perjury under oath in a UK court of law. If this is ignored then what message is the British justice system sending out to the public.. We have laws in place for a reason and nobody should be exempt from these laws celebrities included.

We the public request that...

The right honourable, The Lord Cheif Justice of England and Wales takes the above matter seriously and open a perjury investigation into amber heard.
commentable_entity.letter_body: Amber heard should face perjury charges in the uk
commentable_entity.display_title: Amber heard should face perjury charges in the uk
commentable_entity.petition_title: Amber heard should face perjury charges in the uk
